display_help: Your time spent studying medicine has gained you access to a medical kit that allows you to revive a nearby fallen ally. Allies revived by this power will be healed for a small portion of their health and be protected from XP Debt for 15 seconds. Additional charges of this power can be earned by logging out in a hospital or university. Recharge: Very Long.
display_target_help: You have been revived. You are protected from XP Debt for 15 seconds.
display_attacker_hit: You revive {PlayerDest} from the brink of death. They are very weak and needs to rest.
display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} returns you from the brink of death. However, you are very weak, and must rest for a while to regain your strength.
display_confirm: {PlayerSource} would like to Revive you. You will be revived with XP Debt protection, a moderate amount of health, but no endurance. Do you Accept?

messages.display_attacker_hit: You heal {PlayerDest} with {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} heals you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage over time.
